org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.eventprocessingstrategy

Interface IEventProcessingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImmediateStrategy, AbstractStrategy, ChronicleStrategy, ImmediateStrategy, StrictImmediateStrategy

    public interface IEventProcessingStrategy
    Interface for event processing strategies. An event processing strategy is derived from an EventContext and should take care of the following tasks at runtime:
    • marking event tokens as already handled, so the IQ engine will know which tokens can participate in enabled transitions;
    • firing enabled transitions;
    • recreate EventTokens in the InitState of Automatons, depending on the semantics of the EventContext;
    • handle situations when resetting the Automatons is required by the semantics of the EventContext.
    Author:
    Istvan David
